EDIT_PAGE_TUTORIAL2: The background remover will automaticly make adjustments, so there is no need to be precise.
EDIT_PAGE_HOVER_OVER_BACKGROUND_2: you want to remove from the image
EDIT_PAGE_HOVER_OVER_FOREGROUND_2: you want to keep in the image
EDIT_PAGE_RESULT_CODE_LOW_CONTRAST_2: It may be difficult to remove background in this image Low contrast between the object and background was detected
EDIT_PAGE_RESULT_CODE_BAD_LIGHTING_3: It may be difficult to remove background in this image Poor image lighting was detected
EDIT_PAGE_RESULT_CODE_BG_NOISE_4: It may be difficult to remove background in this image Cluttered background was detected

PROCCESS_ERROR_MESSAGE.TITLE: Automatic background removal is disabled.
PROCCESS_ERROR_MESSAGE.TITLE_EDITOR: It may be difficult to remove background in this image
PROCCESS_ERROR_MESSAGE.1: Could not process, try uploading image again
PROCCESS_ERROR_MESSAGE.2: Low contrast between the object and background was detected
PROCCESS_ERROR_MESSAGE.5: No need for automatic background removal
